message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but I'm open to negotiation.
Alice, your starting point is a bit too greedy. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This round only, otherwise I'll counter lower next time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe I deserve a larger share. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, time is running out and the money is shrinking! I'm offering a 52.5/47.5 split. Take this deal before inflation eats away at our potential gains even further!
